inclusion.criterion: acute DeBakkey I aortic dissection is confirmed by CTA
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: the patient or family members can understand the research plan and will participate in
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: this study and provide a written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Dissection involved the superior mesenteric artery, renal artery and coronary artery,
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: there is a serious complication of nervous system, such as coma, paraplegia, etc
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: anyone with severe emphysema, interstitial pneumonia or ischemic heart disease cannot tolerate surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: subjects with contraindications of heart surgery, anesthesia and extracorporeal circulation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
